name: Canonical URLs are provided when necessary
description:
This is only necessary if your content is available at multiple URLs. 
Open both of these pages and ensure they use <link rel=canonical> tags in the head to indicate the canonical version
solution: Add a canonical link tag to the <head> of each page, pointing to the canonical source document. See [Use canonical URLs](https://support.google.com/webmasters/answer/139066) for more information.
